techmeme.title: Microsoft gives up an observer seat on OpenAI's board, saying it has seen "significant progress" from the new board and is "confident" in OpenAI's direction (Ina Fried/Axios)
Index Ventures, an early investor in Mistral and Cohere, closed $2.3B to chase AI breakthroughs and says that 50%+ of its recent investments have been in AI (Financial Times)
Google says it has stopped purchasing carbon offsets and is no longer maintaining operational carbon neutrality, but still aims to reach net-zero carbon by 2030 (Akshat Rathi/Bloomberg)
Samsung Electronics's union workers declare an indefinite strike on the final day of a three-day walkout and say management showed no intention of holding talks (Kwanwoo Jun/Wall Street Journal)
Microsoft agrees to buy a record 500K carbon credits from US oil producer Occidental's 1PointFive to offset its emissions amid the AI energy surge (Financial Times)
